title: Meaning_Less
descript:
互動裝置
 @城中咖啡廳 安全出入口創作聯展

sub_contents.text:
現實是各種語言組成的框架，
生活裡依賴著和他人共通意義下的溝通，證明某些存在、歸屬或擁有，
但又常覺得自己總是陷落在這些意義的框架裡，逃不出去。
如果是親密而沉默，也許就安全了，
我們可以不需要意義吧。
附著耳機聽，安心的聲音
也許就是沉默。


Reality is the frames made of different languages.
In our lives, we rely on the communication with others, to proof our existence, belongings, or possessing.
But I often find myself lost in these frames of meanings.
If we can be close while quiet, it will be safe.
We may have no meanings.
Listen to the sound of relieve, it’s silence.
